name: Safari 16.1
available: macOS Big Sur and macOS Monterey

advisories.available: macOS Big Sur and macOS Monterey
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

advisories.available: macOS Big Sur and macOS Monterey
advisories.impact: Visiting a malicious website may lead to user interface spoofing
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved UI handling.

advisories.available: macOS Big Sur and macOS Monterey
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A type confusion issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: macOS Big Sur and macOS Monterey
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may disclose sensitive user information
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Abdulrahman Alqabandi of Microsoft Browser Vulnerability Research, Ryan Shin of IAAI SecLab at Korea University, Dohyun Lee (@l33d0hyun) of DNSLab at Korea University

advisories.available: macOS Big Sur and macOS Monterey
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may disclose internal states of the app
advisories.description: A correctness issue in the JIT was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Wonyoung Jung (@nonetype_pwn) of KAIST Hacking Lab

advisories.available: macOS Big Sur and macOS Monterey
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

cves.credit: Yonghwi Jin (@jinmo123) at Theori working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative
